slepc-3.18.3 2023-03-24
Report Typos and Errors

SVDTRLanczosSetRestart

Sets the restart parameter for the thick-restart Lanczos method, in particular the proportion of basis vectors that must be kept after restart.

Synopsis

#include "slepcsvd.h" 
PetscErrorCode SVDTRLanczosSetRestart(SVD svd,PetscReal keep)
Logically Collective on svd

Input Parameters

svd  - the singular value solver
keep  - the number of vectors to be kept at restart

Options Database Key

-svd_trlanczos_restart  - Sets the restart parameter

Notes

Allowed values are in the range [0.1,0.9]. The default is 0.5.

See Also

SVDTRLanczosGetRestart()

Level

advanced

Location

src/svd/impls/trlanczos/trlanczos.c
